attributes.description: Overlay archetypes, i.e. partial archetypes that include full definition and terminology, but logically derive all their meta-data from the owning template.
attributes.name: overlays

meta_info.description: Class representing source template, i.e. a kind of archetype that may include template overlays, and may be restricted by tools to only defining mandations, prohibitions, and restrictions on elements already defined in the flat parent.
meta_info.name: TEMPLATE
